name: The Most Mediocre Platformer Ever
description:
The Most Mediocre Platformer Ever is the first entry in designer Ellery Latham's Mediocre series. On the surface, it's gravity bending platformer where players assume the role of a square. 

Underneath, Mediocre is about the experiences of life. It's  all about highs and lows. Life takes you through ups and downs and even flips you around. At times, it feels like your failures end with you going in circles. However, you'll find that when you don't succeed at first, you always get a second chance. After all, going through life is a process of trial and error. When things get mediocre, never give up.
